short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to transfer Gmail/Indiamart/WhatsApp/JustDial leads to ExpandX ERP with minimal interaction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the next level of automation and CRM. ExpandX CRM is the world leading CRM and ERP system, which helps manufacturing or manufacturing related trading organizations to effectively manage their business operations and automate those to grow with 2X speed. We take pride in innovation to help achieve user speed and accuracy.

In the same spirit we bring on to you, world's first chrome extension which will capture leads from Gmail/WhatsApp/IndiaMart/JustDial system, and push those effortlessly into ExpandX CRM software. If you wish to try it out, please send us mail at info@expandx.in and we will be happy to provide you a 10 day free trial account to try out the wonderful features of this new edge CRM system.

This extension not only works for ExpandX CRM, but also can be integrated with other CRM systems of your choice, to contact regarding customization for the same, please drop a mail at info@expandx.in and we will be glad to help you out.
